verses.verse: וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> vai-yit-pal-Lel prayed יוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah, Then Jonah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; his God מִמְּעֵ֖י <S%H4578><s%> mi-me-'Ei belly הַדָּגָֽה׃ <S%H1710><s%> had-da-Gah. out of the fish's

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And said קָ֠רָאתִי <S%H7121><s%> Ka-ra-ti I cried מִצָּ֥רָה <S%H6869><s%> mitz-Tza-rah by reason of mine affliction לִ֛י li אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni; and he heard מִבֶּ֧טֶן <S%H990><s%> mib-Be-ten me out of the belly שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol of hell שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> shiv-Va'-ti cried שָׁמַ֥עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ta I [and] thou heardest קוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li. my voice

וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤נִי <S%H7993><s%> vat-tash-li-Che-ni For thou hadst cast מְצוּלָה֙ <S%H4688><s%> me-tzu-Lah me into the deep בִּלְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> bil-Vav in the midst יַמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim, of the seas וְנָהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> ve-na-Har and the floods יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <S%H5437><s%> ye-soe-Ve-ni; compassed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <S%H4867><s%> mish-ba-Rei-cha me about all thy billows וְגַלֶּ֖יךָ <S%H1530><s%> ve-gal-Lei-cha and thy waves עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Va-ru. passed over

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, Then I said נִגְרַ֖שְׁתִּי <S%H1644><s%> nig-Rash-ti I am cast out מִנֶּ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> min-Ne-ged from עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha; of thy sight אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Nevertheless אוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> o-Sif again לְהַבִּ֔יט <S%H5027><s%> le-hab-Bit, yet I will look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הֵיכַ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> kod-She-cha toward thy holy

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי <S%H661><s%> 'a-fa-Fu-ni compassed me about מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim The waters עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- to the point נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, [even] to the soul תְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> te-Hom the depth יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <S%H5437><s%> ye-soe-Ve-ni; closed me round about ס֖וּף <S%H5488><s%> suf the weeds חָב֥וּשׁ <S%H2280><s%> cha-Vush were wrapped about לְרֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> le-ro-Shi. my head

לְקִצְבֵ֤י <S%H7095><s%> le-kitz-Vei to the bottoms הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of the mountains יָרַ֔דְתִּי <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad-ti, I went down הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the earth בְּרִחֶ֥יהָ <S%H1280><s%> be-ri-Chei-ha with her bars בַעֲדִ֖י <S%H1157><s%> va-'a-Di around לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; [was] about me for ever וַתַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> vat-Ta-'al yet hast thou brought up מִשַּׁ֛חַת <S%H7845><s%> mish-Sha-chat from corruption חַיַּ֖י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai my life יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֤ף <S%H5848><s%> be-hit-'at-Tef fainted עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai When נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, When my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God זָכָ֑רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> za-Cha-re-ti; within me I remembered וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo came in אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha and תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti, and my prayer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הֵיכַ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> kod-She-cha unto thee into thine holy

מְשַׁמְּרִ֖ים <S%H8104><s%> me-sham-me-Rim They that observe הַבְלֵי־ <S%H1892><s%> hav-lei- vanities שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> Shav; lying חַסְדָּ֖ם <S%H2617><s%> chas-Dam their own mercy יַעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> ya-'a-Zou. forsake

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I בְּק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol unto thee with the voice תּוֹדָה֙ <S%H8426><s%> to-Dah of thanksgiving אֶזְבְּחָה־ <S%H2076><s%> 'ez-be-chah- But I will sacrifice לָּ֔ךְ Lach, אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָדַ֖רְתִּי <S%H5087><s%> na-Dar-ti [that] that I have vowed אֲשַׁלֵּ֑מָה <S%H7999><s%> 'a-shal-Le-mah; I will pay יְשׁוּעָ֖תָה <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'A-tah Salvation לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [is] of the LORD ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD לַדָּ֑ג <S%H1709><s%> lad-Dag; unto the fish וַיָּקֵ֥א <S%H6958><s%> vai-ya-Ke and it vomited out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3124><s%> yo-Nah Jonah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- onto הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H3004><s%> hai-yab-ba-Shah. upon the dry פ Peh
